thread.title: Your Personalized Guide to Paris Fashion Week
thread.title_full: Your Personalized Guide to Paris Fashion Week -- The Cut

author: The Cut
title: Your Personalized Guide to Paris Fashion Week
text:
Photo: Catwalking/Getty Images
There are so many photos coming out of Paris Fashion Week — and so many stories, and Instagrams, and tweets — that it's hard for any one person to follow it all. That's why we've created the Cut's Style Personality Quiz , a highly detailed Myers-Briggs-inspired test optimized to nail down your exact personal style.
Just like Myers-Briggs sorts you into one of 16 personality types like ENFP or INTJ, our quiz will determine whether you're an MCRI (Minimalist Consistent Romantic Individualistic) or an XAIT (Maximalist Adventurous Intellectual Trend-Enthusiast). Then, it'll tell you precisely which fashion month slideshows deserve your most rapt attention. Enjoy!
Already taken the quiz and want to see your daily style picks?
Jump to your type
Jump to your type MAIT MAII MARI MART XAIT XAII XART XARI MCRI MCRT MCII MCIT XCRT XCRI XCIT XCII The Cut Quiz: What’s Your Style Personality? Section 1 of 4:
Minimalist & Maximalist You love making new friends, and introduce yourself to new people often.
very uncharacteristic uncharacteristic neutral characteristic very characteristic very uncharacteristic neutral very characteristic You can always find something to talk about with anyone.
very uncharacteristic uncharacteristic neutral characteristic very characteristic very uncharacteristic neutral very characteristic If life had a spotlight, it would be on you all the time — and you dress accordingly.
very uncharacteristic uncharacteristic neutral characteristic very characteristic very uncharacteristic neutral very characteristic Your idea of a hot night is a date with Netflix and your sweatpants.
very uncharacteristic uncharacteristic neutral characteristic very characteristic very uncharacteristic neutral very characteristic You're not afraid to tell people exactly how you feel.
very uncharacteristic uncharacteristic neutral characteristic very characteristic very uncharacteristic neutral very characteristic Co-workers routinely compliment you on your fashion choices.
very uncharacteristic uncharacteristic neutral characteristic very characteristic very uncharacteristic neutral very characteristic You're always surrounded by a #squad of friends.
very uncharacteristic uncharacteristic neutral characteristic very characteristic very uncharacteristic neutral very characteristic You'd prefer to blend into a crowd rather than draw attention.
very uncharacteristic uncharacteristic neutral characteristic very characteristic very uncharacteristic neutral very characteristic Brunching with friends is your favorite way to unwind.
very uncharacteristic uncharacteristic neutral characteristic very characteristic very uncharacteristic neutral very characteristic You'd rather be the one taking the Instagram than posing for the photo.
very uncharacteristic uncharacteristic neutral characteristic very characteristic very uncharacteristic neutral very characteristic You think of fashion as a costume for the day ahead.
very uncharacteristic uncharacteristic neutral characteristic very characteristic very uncharacteristic neutral very characteristic You would never wear something loud to a party, for fear all eyes would be on you.
very uncharacteristic uncharacteristic neutral characteristic very characteristic very uncharacteristic neutral very characteristic You know just what to say to anyone at any party, no matter how awkward.
